/**
 * file-manager-js/info
 * @copyright 2018 Eyas Ranjous <eyas.ranjous@gmail.com>
 * @license MIT
 */
 
// gets an extended stats object from stats
module.exports = (stat, dirSize) => (path) => {
  let info = {};
  return stat(path)
    .then((stats) => {
      info = Object.assign({}, stats);
      if (stats.isFile()) {
        info.type = 'file';
        return stats.size;
      }
      info.type = 'directory';
      return dirSize(path);
    })
    .then((sz) => {
      info.size = sz;
      return info;
    });
};
 
Code coverage generated by istanbul at Mon Jul 30 2018 18:14:33 GMT-0500 (CDT)
